issues: Semantic conflict: asserted env_local_scale 'area of evergreen forest' conflicts with inferred land cover showing mixed/deciduous forest dominance
Missing ecosystem and ecosystem_category fields (present in some other study samples)

recommendations: Update env_local_scale from 'area of evergreen forest' to 'area of mixed forest' or 'area of deciduous forest' to match inferred land cover data
Populate missing ecosystem ('Environmental') and ecosystem_category ('Terrestrial') fields for consistency with other study samples
Verify elevation measurement or accept 12.1m geospatial difference as reasonable for forest sampling
Standardize ecosystem field population across all study samples
Consider adding more specific env_local_scale terms that better reflect the mixed forest environment
